column6: War rages across the entire Shi'Ar Empire!  Emperor D'Ken is back and his new right hand man, Vulcan, plans on doing some truly terrible things to Charles Xavier!  But the X-Men and Starjammers are en route to save him.  This could turn into a suicide mission quicker than you can say M'Kraan!
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Danny K. Miki | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
